item.title: Staff member shot at Oakland college in the city's second school shooting in 2 days
item.description: A senior member of the athletics staff at a community college in Oakland has been shot on campus

item.title: South Carolina man is scheduled to be executed by firing squad
item.description: A man on death row in South Carolina is scheduled to be executed by firing squad
